howItWorks.title: How EcoWaste Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From waste to wealth in 5 simple steps. Start earning today.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Take a photo of your waste. Our AI identifies the type (plastic, paper, metal, organic) and tells you its value.
howItWorks.step2Desc: See nearby drop-off points or schedule a pickup. Real-time map shows collection trucks and their routes.
howItWorks.step3Title: Drop Off or Get Picked Up
howItWorks.step3Desc: Drop waste at designated points or wait for the collection truck. Track the truck in real-time on your phone.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Your waste is routed to manufacturers who need it. Plastic → Plastic manufacturers, Paper → Paper mills, etc.
howItWorks.step5Desc: Get tokens based on waste type and weight. 1 kg plastic = 50 tokens. Convert to cash via M-Pesa or bank transfer.
